mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT A.structure_cd AS structureCd, concat(A.structure_cd,' ',A.structure_name) AS structureName FROM MA0020 A WHERE A.structure_level = '2'

SELECT DISTINCT ofc k, CONCAT(ma_cd,' ',ofc) AS v,ofc d FROM MA1000 where 1=1
AND ( lower(ofc) like lower(CONCAT('%',#{v,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')) OR lower(ma_cd) like lower(CONCAT('%',#{v,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')) )
